name: Crystalloid Solution
side_effects: Increased intracranial pressure (large volumes, primarily of concern in patients with already increased intracranial pressure)

general: TBSA - Total Body Surface Area - severity of burns metric measuring only 2nd and 3rd degree burns

pearls: Use Lactated Ringers (if available) for all Critical or Serious Burns [TB1]
For amputated parts - Wrap part in sterile dressing soaked in normal saline or lactated ringer [TB4]
For avulsed tooth - rinse with normal saline or lactated ringers [UP7]
